abstract: T J Lane, serving life in prison for killing three students in a school cafeteria in 2012, is transferred with two other inmates to a maximum-security prison after briefly escaping a lower-security site.
lead_paragraph: T. J. Lane, a 19-year-old serving life in prison for killing three students in a school cafeteria in 2012, was transferred with two other inmates to a maximum-security prison on Friday after briefly escaping a lower-security site, the Ohio Department of Rehabilitation and Correction said.

headline.main: Ohio: Answers Sought in Prison Break
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Answers Sought in Prison Break
